title: Too Many Tabs with Nicole Byer
itunes:title: Too Many Tabs with Nicole Byer
description:
This week actor, author, comedian, and podcast host Nicole Byer has all kinds of things in her cart (across all kinds of windows and tabs) but hasn’t yet clicked that *purchase* button. Together, Ku, Su, and Nicole discuss what should cross that finish line, and what should maybe just stay on the sidelines. Plus, Ku and Su tell you their new favorite shopping companion. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • In her Sephora cart, Nicole has the Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick, Peace Out Puffy Out Patches, and Dermalogica Exfoliant Exfolier
  • Amongst the 12 or so other things in her SHEIN cart (which she has complicated feelings about…mostly guilt) she has this cute chili pepper swimsuit
  • Nicole loves purple and really wants some purple jellies, but so far she can only find baby gap ones (won’t fit) or Gucci ones (doesn’t want to spend $500 on jellies). Someone help Nicole find purple jellies! This is a call to action!
  • Rakuten will help you make money while you spend it! 

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
